import { Component, Input } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-user-info', templateUrl: './user-info.component.html', styleUrls: ['./user-info.component.scss'] }) export class UserInfoComponent { @Input() user: any; }

Account Details

Username:

{{user.Username}}

Email:

{{user.Email}}

Birthday:

{{user.Birthday}}
